scale: memo: x scaled by 'values' - (vectors[i][4] is not presentedin dimesions). Currently only x can be scaled

serials.label: Front
serials.vec-desc:
in the plane of Inactive, x = 1 (first coord), bar[y = 0, z = 1] = 8, bar[y = 1, z = 1] = 6,
                where z = 1 such that all bars in 'Front' plane

serials.label: Back
serials.vec-desc:
in the plane of Inactive, bar[y = 0, z = 0] = 2, bar[y = 1, z = 0] = 3,
                where z = 0 such that all bars in 'Back' plane
